mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY postID DESC) AA WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (POSTID, SUBJECT, USERNAME, CONTENT, NOTICE, IP, USERID) VALUES (BOARD_POSTID_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{userName}, #{content}, #{notice}, #{ip}, 4)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE notice = 'true' ORDER BY POSTID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE POSTID = #{postID}
UPDATE BOARD SET DELETEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE POSTID = #{postID}
